item.title: Singapore Selects ‘Stranger Eyes’ as Oscar Contender for Best International Feature
item.description: Singapore has tapped “Stranger Eyes” as its official submission for the 98th Academy Awards’ best international feature film category, the Singapore Film Commission has revealed. The
